pages.text: Monsters have been tweaked to be harder to deal with. Luckily, the most notable of changes are noted here.

pages.title: Mob Griefing
pages.text: Most mobs (with arms) are able to break windows, doors, and trapdoors. In addition, if they are able to locate a chest, they just might start out items. Have fun!

pages.title: Ranged Mobs
pages.text: Any mob can carry a crossbow. Mobs with crossbows will strafe away from player when reloading.

pages.title: Awesome Creepers
pages.text: Creepers explode based on promimity instead of sight. Especially dangerous when near any sort of wall.

pages.title: Climbing Mobs
pages.text: Mobs can now climb ladders. No idea why they couldn't do that before.
